overview:
In addition to David’s role as advisor to Rixty, he also serves as the Executive in Residence at the Haas School of Business at UC Berkeley and an independent marketing and strategy consultant. Previously, David served at the VP of Marketing at Yahoo, Inc. where he was responsible for marketing teams on both the BtoB and the Consumer sides of the business. While at Yahoo, David, oversaw a staff of 100 marketers and managed product marketing and go-to-market efforts for virtually all of Yahoo!s products across their customer base of 500M. Before Yahoo, David worked in marketing and executive roles at The Feedroom, Quokka Sports and J. Walter Thompson.

David holds a Bachelors degree from Brown University and an MBA in Marketing from Columbia Univerisity.
